attributes.action: Take positive action against the regime of Zimbabwe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the UK government to take positive action against the Government of Zimbabwe to include military action if necessary to ensure free and fair elections and to prevent food aid being used as a tool of control against the British Commonwealth people of Zimbabwe

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
